tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: Well. Look who it is, my favorite little Shifter.

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: The name's Rez. Don't wear it out.

tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: Did you really think you can run us around this waterfall and return to town without consequence? That we'd just give up on you?

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: No, but if you're offering, I wouldn't mind the freedom.

tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: This isn't a game, Shifter! You are a criminal, and I will delight in bringing you down.
